SANDBOXD(8) System Manager's Manual SANDBOXD(8)

NAME

sandboxd —
sandbox daemon

SYNOPSIS

sandboxd [s]

sandboxd

DESCRIPTION

sandboxd performs services on behalf of the Sandbox kernel extension.

The options are as follows:

-b
Just log basic sandbox violation information without a backtrace.
-s
Do not symbolicate backtraces.

This command is not intended to be invoked directly.

SEE ALSO

sandbox-exec(1), sandbox_init(3), sandbox(7)
July 29, 2008 Mac OS X
